content.text: Match ends, Fulham 4, Burnley 2.
Second Half ends, Fulham 4, Burnley 2.
Foul by André-Frank Zambo Anguissa (Fulham).
Charlie Taylor (Burnley) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Luciano Vietto (Fulham) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Ryan Sessegnon.
Marcus Bettinelli (Fulham) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Fulham. Calum Chambers tries a through ball, but Aleksandar Mitrovic is caught offside.
Offside, Burnley. James Tarkowski tries a through ball, but Sam Vokes is caught offside.
Substitution, Fulham. Ryan Sessegnon replaces André Schürrle.
